itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 16, 2013
teaser: Now that Larry Summers has officially withdrawn his name from consideration for the Federal Reserve chairman, international markets are responding in a big way -- global stocks are near five year highs. And in just two weeks, millions of Americans will start enrolling in the new health exchanges. But many still remain confused about the process. Now the government is hiring special navigators to help consumers enroll.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 16, 2013
byline: D Gorenstein, Alice Walker, Mitchell Hartman, Jeff Tyler, Bruce Johnson, Will Oremus, Karen Clark and David Brancaccio
description: Now that Larry Summers has officially withdrawn his name from consideration for the Federal Reserve chairman, international markets are responding in a big way -- global stocks are near five year highs. And in just two weeks, millions of Americans will start enrolling in the new health exchanges. But many still remain confused about the process. Now the government is hiring special navigators to help consumers enroll.
